entities.description: The unweighted frequency of a particular response in the survey.
The percentage of a particular response in the survey.
Frequency and percentage of missing data in the survey responses.
Statistical measures such as mean, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
Type of the survey variable, which could be numeric.
The range of values that are considered missing in the survey data.

relationships.description: Relates a survey response to its unweighted frequency.
Relates a survey response to its percentage representation.
Indicates the frequency and percentage of missing data for survey responses.
Indicates the statistical measures of a survey variable.
Specifies the type of the survey variable.
Defines the range of values considered as missing.
